data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Neuquén, Argentina to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Neuquén, Argentina

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Neuquén that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Neuquén, Argentina.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Neuquén, Argentina.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 52,413 believers in the state of Neuquén.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Neuquén, Argentina.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Neuquén, Argentina has a population of 474,200.

We estimate Neuquén has 52,413 people who might know Jesus, 389,108 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 32,679 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Neuquén, Argentina to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
